name: fuggs-landing
description: Fuggs Landing Page - Modern landing page for the intelligent club accounting software

scripts.docker:dev: docker build -t fuggs-landing site/ && docker run -p 8080:80 fuggs-landing
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: Fuggs
